name: Hiroshi
cooking_method: Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces and thread onto skewers.
In a saucepan, mix together the soy sauce, sake, mirin, and sugar, and heat over medium heat until the sugar has dissolved.
Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat.
Brush the chicken skewers with the sauce and grill for about 3-4 minutes on each side, basting occasionally with the sauce, until the chicken is cooked through.
Serve the chicken skewers sprinkled with sliced green onions.
